languages.text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.
languages.original_text:
Если владелец наручей наносит урон, его враги получают 1–3 варп-урона (с пробитием брони в 10%) за каждую клетку, которую они проходят до конца хода владельца.
Приверженец Скверны, владеющий наручами, наносит врагам 1–6 варп-урона.

traits.locale_text: If the wielder deals damage, their enemies suffer 1-3 warp damage (with armour penetration of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wielder's turn. Hereticus — Adherent: the enemies suffer 1-6 warp damage instead.

If the wearer deals damage, their enemies suffer 1-3 warp damage (with armour penetration of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's turn. Hereticus — Adherent: the enemies suffer 1-6 warp damage instead.

If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

languages.text: Если владелец наручей наносит {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g}, его враги получают (от 1 до 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}варп-урона{/g} (с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 10%) за каждую клетку, которую они проходят до конца {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} владельца. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Еретик{/g} — сторонник: вместо этого враги получают (от 1 до 6) варп-урона.

Si el portador inflige {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, sus enemigos sufren (de 1 a 3) de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 10 %) por cada casilla que se haya movido el enemigo durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hereje{/g}: Partidario: el daño de disformidad sufrido por el enemigo pasa a ser (de 1 a 6).
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

traits.locale_text: Si el portador inflige daño, sus enemigos sufren 1-3 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}daño de disformidad{/g} (con {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 10 %) por cada casilla que se haya movido el enemigo durante el {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del portador. Hereticus: Partidario: el daño de disformidad sufrido por el enemigo pasa a ser 1-6.

languages.text: 如果装备者对敌人造成了{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，则在装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，该敌人每移动1格，就会受到1-3点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}（拥有10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}异端主义{/g}——拥护者：改为造成1-6点亚空间伤害。
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

traits.locale_text: 如果装备者对敌人造成了伤害，则在装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中，该敌人每移动1格，就会受到1-3点{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}亚空间伤害{/g}（拥有10%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}）。 异端主义——拥护者：改为造成1-6点亚空间伤害。

languages.text: Si l'utilisateur inflige des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, ses ennemis subissent (entre 1 et 3) points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts Warp{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 10 %) par case parcourue par ceux-ci pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Hérétique{/g} — Partisan : les ennemis subissent (entre 1 et 6) points de dégâts Warp à la place.
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

traits.locale_text: Si l'utilisateur inflige des dégâts, ses ennemis subissent 1 à 3 points de {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}dégâts warp{/g} (avec une {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} de 10 %) par case parcourue par ceux-ci pendant le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} de l'utilisateur. Hereticus — Partisan : les ennemis subissent 1 à 6 points de dégâts warp à la place.

languages.text: Wenn der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt, erleiden seine Feinde (von 1 bis 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} (mit 10 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g}) für jedes Feld, das der Feind während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers zurückgelegt hat. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Ketzer{/g} – Anhänger: Die Feinde erleiden stattdessen (von 1 bis 6) Warp-Schaden.
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Träger Schaden zufügt, erleiden seine Feinde 1-3 {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}Warp-Schaden{/g} (mit {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} von 10 %) für jedes Feld, das der Feind während des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des Trägers zurückgelegt hat. Haereticus — Anhänger: Die Feinde erleiden stattdessen 1-6 Warp-Schaden.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を負った場合、敵は使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に移動したセルごとに、1～3の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}ワープダメージ{/g}(10%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g})を負う。 {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}異端者{/g} ― 門下生：敵はその代わりに1～6のワープダメージを負う。
languages.original_text: If the wearer deals {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, their enemies suffer (from 1 to 3) {g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}warp damage{/g} (with {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} of 10%) for each cell the enemy has moved during the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkCorruption}Heretical{/g} — Adherent: the enemies suffer (from 1 to 6) warp damage instead.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がダメージを負った場合、敵は使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中に移動したセルごとに、1-3の{g|Encyclopedia:WarpDamage}<歪み>ダメージ{/g} (10%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g})を負う。 異端者 ― 門下生：敵はその代わりに1-6の<歪み>ダメージを負う。
